pages.text: Why do you not help each other now
No, today they come in absolute submission
and they will turn on one another, questioning each other
[Some] will say, "You used to approach us from a position of power
The others will say, "No, you [yourselves] were not believers
and we had no authority over you, but you were exceedingly arrogant people
Our Lord's Word has been carried out against us, and we will all taste punishment
We misled you, and we were ourselves misled
On that Day, they will share in the punishment
for that is how We deal with those who forced others to reject Our messages
Whenever they were told, "There is no god but God," they became arrogant
and would say, "Are we to give up our gods for a mad poet
Rather, the Prophet has come with the Truth and confirmed the [previous] messengers
You [who deny the truth] will taste the painful punishment
and you will be repaid only for what you used to do
Not so for God's devoted worshipers
they will have recognizable provision
of fruits, and they will be honored
in Gardens of delight
[resting] on couches and facing one another
A cup from a flowing spring will be passed among them
white and delicious to the drinkers
which will neither sicken nor intoxicate them
With them are mates of modest gaze with beautiful eyes
just like closely guarded pearls
They will turn to one another, inquiring
One of them says" I used to have a friend [on earth]
